alert.note: Alert for Berkeley; Charleston (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Charleston (the Southern end of South Carolina and Eastern Georgia)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 11 at 6:50PM EDT until August 11 at 7:15PM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 715 PM EDT FOR PORTIONS OF CHARLESTON AND BERKELEY COUNTIES... At 649 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Northern Lake Moultrie to Bull Island, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and powerlines. Locations impacted include: Mount Pleasant, Moncks Corner, McClellanville, Isle Of Palms, Saint Stephen, Awendaw, Bonneau, Jamestown, Garris Landing, Mount Pleasant Regional Airport, Cross, Price Inlet, Northern Lake Moultrie, Bull Island and Capers Inlet. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Report damage directly to the Charleston National Weather Service at 888-383-2024 when it is safe to do so.
